description: This Kotlin source file provides utility functions and objects for managing focus behavior on Android TV applications using Jetpack Compose. It introduces a singleton object 'TVFocus' to manage focus requesters and a Modifier extension 'dpadFocusable' to handle DPAD navigation, visual focus feedback, and key event handling.

classes.name: TVFocus
classes.description: Singleton object providing focus management helper, particularly creating and remembering a FocusRequester for initial focus.

methods.name: rememberFirstItemFocusRequester
methods.description: Creates and remembers a FocusRequester instance to set initial focus on the first focusable item.

methods.name: dpadFocusable
methods.description: A Modifier extension function that makes a UI element focusable via DPAD, provides visual feedback on focus, and handles key events for navigation keys.
